verses.verse: <S%G1161>Then<s%> drew <S%G1448>near<s%> to him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G5057>publicans<s%> and <S%G268>sinners<s%> for to <S%G191>hear<s%> him.
And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G1234>murmured,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>This<s%> man <S%G4327>receives<s%> <S%G268>sinners,<s%> and <S%G4906>eats<s%> with them.
And he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>parable<s%> to them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> of you, <S%G2192>having<s%> an <S%G1540>hundred<s%> <S%G4263>sheep,<s%> if he <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, does not <S%G2641>leave<s%> the <S%G1768>ninety<s%> and <S%G1768>nine<s%> in the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1909>after<s%> that which is <S%G622>lost,<s%> <S%G2193>until<s%> he <S%G2147>find<s%> it?
And when he has found <S%G2147><s%> it, he lays <S%G2007><s%> it <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G5606>shoulders,<s%> rejoicing. <S%G5463><s%>

And when he <S%G2064>comes<s%> <S%G3624>home,<s%> he <S%G4779>calls<s%> together <S%G4779><s%> his <S%G5384>friends<s%> and <S%G1069>neighbors,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to them, <S%G4796>Rejoice<s%> with me; for I have <S%G2147>found<s%> my <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was lost. <S%G622><s%>

I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, that <S%G3779>likewise<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> shall be in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G268>sinner<s%> that <S%G3340>repents,<s%> more <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1768>ninety<s%> and <S%G1768>nine<s%> <S%G1342>just<s%> persons, <S%G3748>which<s%> need <S%G2192><s%> <S%G5532><s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

<S%G2228>Either<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G1176>ten<s%> <S%G1406>pieces<s%> of <S%G1406>silver,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> she <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1406>piece,<s%> does not <S%G681>light<s%> a <S%G3088>candle,<s%> and <S%G4563>sweep<s%> the <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G1960>diligently<s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> she find <S%G2147><s%> it?

And when she has found <S%G2147><s%> it, she calls <S%G4779><s%> her <S%G5384>friends<s%> and her <S%G1069>neighbors<s%> <S%G4779>together,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G4796>Rejoice<s%> with me; for I have <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G1406>piece<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I had lost. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G3779>Likewise,<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, there is <S%G5479>joy<s%> in the <S%G1799>presence<s%> of the <S%G32>angels<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G268>sinner<s%> that repents. <S%G3340><s%>
And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> A <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> sons: <S%G5207><s%>

And the <S%G3501>younger<s%> of them <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> me the <S%G3313>portion<s%> of <S%G3776>goods<s%> that falls <S%G1911><s%> to me. And he <S%G1244>divided<s%> to them his living. <S%G979><s%>

And not <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> the <S%G3501>younger<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G4863>together,<s%> and <S%G589>took<s%> his <S%G589>journey<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3117>far<s%> <S%G5561>country,<s%> and <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G1287>wasted<s%> his <S%G3776>substance<s%> with <S%G811>riotous<s%> living. <S%G2198><s%>

And when he had <S%G1159>spent<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> there <S%G1096>arose<s%> a <S%G2478>mighty<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> in that <S%G5561>land;<s%> and he <S%G756>began<s%> to be in want. <S%G5302><s%>

And he <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G2853>joined<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> to a <S%G4177>citizen<s%> of that <S%G5561>country;<s%> and he <S%G3992>sent<s%> him <S%G1519>into<s%> his <S%G68>fields<s%> to <S%G1006>feed<s%> swine. <S%G5519><s%>

And he would <S%G1937>fain<s%> have <S%G1072>filled<s%> his <S%G2836>belly<s%> with the <S%G2769>husks<s%> that the <S%G5519>swine<s%> did <S%G2068>eat:<s%> and <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> to him.

And when he <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G1438>himself,<s%> he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G4214>How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G3407>hired<s%> <S%G3407>servants<s%> of my <S%G3962>father's<s%> have <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G4052>enough<s%> and to <S%G4052>spare,<s%> and I <S%G622>perish<s%> with hunger! <S%G3042><s%>

I will <S%G450>arise<s%> and <S%G4198>go<s%> to my <S%G3962>father,<s%> and will <S%G2046>say<s%> to him, <S%G3962>Father,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and <S%G1799>before<s%> you,

And <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> your <S%G5207>son:<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> me as <S%G1520>one<s%> of your <S%G3407>hired<s%> servants. <S%G3407><s%>

And he <S%G450>arose,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to his <S%G3962>father.<s%> But when he was <S%G2089>yet<s%> a <S%G3112>great<s%> <S%G3112>way<s%> <S%G568>off,<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> him, and had <S%G4697>compassion,<s%> and <S%G5143>ran,<s%> and <S%G1968>fell<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> his <S%G5137>neck,<s%> and <S%G2705>kissed<s%> him.

And the <S%G5207>son<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G3962>Father,<s%> I have <S%G264>sinned<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and in your <S%G1799>sight,<s%> and <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3765>no<s%> <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be <S%G2564>called<s%> your son. <S%G5207><s%>

But the <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G1401>servants,<s%> <S%G1627>Bring<s%> <S%G1627>forth<s%> the <S%G4413>best<s%> <S%G4749>robe,<s%> and put <S%G1746><s%> it <S%G1746>on<s%> him; and <S%G1325>put<s%> a <S%G1146>ring<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> his <S%G5495>hand,<s%> and <S%G5266>shoes<s%> on <S%G1519><s%> his feet: <S%G4228><s%>
And <S%G5342>bring<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> the <S%G4618>fatted<s%> <S%G3448>calf,<s%> and kill <S%G2380><s%> it; and let us <S%G5315>eat,<s%> and be merry: <S%G2165><s%>

For <S%G3778>this<s%> my <S%G5207>son<s%> was <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and is <S%G326>alive<s%> <S%G326>again;<s%> he was <S%G622>lost,<s%> and is <S%G2147>found.<s%> And they <S%G756>began<s%> to be merry. <S%G2165><s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> his <S%G4245>elder<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> was in the <S%G68>field:<s%> and as he <S%G2064>came<s%> and drew <S%G1448>near<s%> to the <S%G3614>house,<s%> he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G4858>music<s%> and dancing. <S%G5525><s%>
And he <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G3816>servants,<s%> and <S%G4441>asked<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things meant. <S%G1498><s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, Your <S%G80>brother<s%> is <S%G2240>come;<s%> and your <S%G3962>father<s%> has <S%G2380>killed<s%> the <S%G4618>fatted<s%> <S%G3448>calf,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> he has <S%G618>received<s%> him <S%G5198>safe<s%> and sound. <S%G5198><s%>
And he was <S%G3710>angry,<s%> and <S%G2309>would<s%> not <S%G1525>go<s%> in: <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> out, and <S%G3870>entreated<s%> him.

And he <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to his <S%G3962>father,<s%> <S%G2400>See,<s%> <S%G5118>these<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> do I <S%G1398>serve<s%> you, <S%G3763>neither<s%> <S%G3928>transgressed<s%> I <S%G3763>at<s%> <S%G3763>any<s%> time your <S%G1785>commandment:<s%> and yet you <S%G3763>never<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> me a <S%G2056>kid,<s%> that I might <S%G2165>make<s%> <S%G2165>merry<s%> with my friends: <S%G5384><s%>

But as <S%G3753>soon<s%> as <S%G3778>this<s%> your <S%G5207>son<s%> was <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> has <S%G2719>devoured<s%> your <S%G979>living<s%> with <S%G4204>harlots,<s%> you have <S%G2380>killed<s%> for him the <S%G4618>fatted<s%> calf. <S%G3448><s%>
And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5043>Son,<s%> you <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G3842>ever<s%> with me, and <S%G3956>all<s%> that I <S%G1699>have<s%> is yours. <S%G4674><s%>

It was <S%G1163>meet<s%> that we should <S%G2165>make<s%> <S%G2165>merry,<s%> and be <S%G5463>glad:<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> your <S%G80>brother<s%> was <S%G3498>dead,<s%> and is <S%G326>alive<s%> <S%G326>again;<s%> and was <S%G622>lost,<s%> and is found. <S%G2147><s%>
